DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study will assess the efficacy and safety of sequential neoadjuvant chemotherapy and Avastin, before surgery and/or radiotherapy, in patients with inflammatory or locally advanced operable breast cancer. Patients will receive FEC, followed by paclitaxel, given concomitantly with Avastin (10mg/kg i.v. every 2 weeks). The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is <100 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Patients With Inflammatory or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer.
DOC.criteria: female patients, >=18 years of age; stage III, or inflammatory breast cancer; ER/PgR positive or negative and HER2 negative; normal LVEF. previous chemotherapy/endocrine therapy; evidence of distant metastatic disease; other primary tumors in last 5 years (except for adequately treated cancer in situ of the cervix, or basal cell skin cancer); chronic daily treatment with >325mg/day aspirin, or >75mg/day clopidogrel.
